remarks: Expansion of a common form used in quantifier-free definitions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:

brtxpsd $p |- ( -. A ran ( ( _V (x) _E ) (++) ( R (x) _V ) ) B <-> A. x ( x e. B <-> x R A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d R x $.
